rooms.description: A contemporary open-plan space combining kitchen, dining, and living area with ample natural light and modern finishes. Vastu principles: Entry positioned on the south-east corner to enhance energy flow.
Fully equipped gym featuring state-of-the-art workout equipment, mirrored walls, and soundproofing for privacy. Located in a quiet section of the villa with proper ventilation.
A spacious master bedroom suite with integrated en-suite bathroom, walk-in closet, and private balcony. Vastu alignment: West-facing window for relaxation and privacy.
Dedicated guest room with a comfortable queen-sized bed, study area, and minimalistic decor. Placed strategically to maintain privacy.
